alert.note: Alert for Northern Fairfield; Northern Middlesex; Northern New Haven; Northern New London; Southern Fairfield; Southern Middlesex; Southern New Haven; Southern New London (Connecticut) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS New York City - Upton (Long Island and New York City)
info.headline: Fire Weather Watch issued May 16 at 3:02PM EDT until May 17 at 8:00PM EDT by NWS New York City - Upton
info.description: ...RED FLAG WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 8 PM EDT THIS EVENING FOR SOUTHERN CONNECTICUT... ...FIRE WEATHER WATCH REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM WEDNESDAY MORNING THROUGH WEDNESDAY EVENING FOR SOUTHERN CONNECTICUT... * AFFECTED AREA...Fairfield, New Haven, Middlesex, and New London. * TIMING...From late morning into the early evening hours on Tuesday and Wednesday. * WINDS...Gusty southwest winds early this evening an then Northwest 10 to 20 mph with gusts up to 25 mph on Wednesday. * RELATIVE HUMIDITY...As low as 20 percent. * TEMPERATURES...In the mid 60s Wednesday. * LIGHTNING...none. * IMPACTS...rapid fire spread if ignition occurs.
info.instruction: A Red Flag Warning means that critical fire weather conditions are expected or occurring. A combination of strong winds, low relative humidity, and dry fuels will create a significantly elevated fire growth potential. A Fire Weather Watch means that critical fire weather conditions are forecast to occur. Listen for further updates regarding this potential.
